#include<stdio.h>
inline int inp()
{
int noRead=0;
char p=getchar_unlocked();
for(;p<33;)
{
p=getchar_unlocked();
};
while(p>32)
{
noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
p=getchar_unlocked();
}
return noRead;
}

int main()
{
int n,q,tem,i,j,x,y,count;
n=inp();q=inp();
int a[10001][101]={{}};
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	tem=inp();
	for(j=1;j<101;j++)
		a[i][j]=a[i-1][j];
	a[i][tem]++;
}
while(q--)
{
	count=0;
	x=inp();y=inp();
	for(j=1;j<101;j++)	
		if(a[y][j]-a[x-1][j]>0)count++;
	printf("%d\n",count);
}
return 0;
}
